oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1960-11-12 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from November 12, 1960. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Locklin (host/performer - his first appearance as a member of the Opry), guest performer Carl Butler, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Archie Campbell, Tommy Jackson, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 1101st broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; Archie Campbell; Don Gibson; Carl Butler; Del Wood; Hank Locklin; Jordanaires
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Locklin introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Archie Campbell) -- The Proof Is In The Puffing (Don Gibson) (recording) -- Hank Locklin introduces Carl Butler -- I'm A Prisoner Of Love (Carl Butler) -- Grant Turner introduces Del Wood -- The World Is Waiting For The Sunrise (Del Wood) -- Grant Turner and Hank Locklin announce his tour schedule -- One Step Ahead Of My Past (Hank Locklin, Jordanaires) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hank Locklin) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Network announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; Smathers, Ben, -1990; Stoney Mountain Cloggers; Jackson, Tommy; Campbell, Archie; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Atkins, Chet; Wood, Del; Jordanaires (Musical group); Locklin, Hank; Butler, Carl; Gibson, Don (Donald Eugene), 1928-2003
